short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates chrome tab snapshot of current window. Lets you to reload the saved snapshot immediately.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creates chrome tab snapshot of your current window.
added context menu
Supports pinned tabs and tabGroups.
Supports open as tabs

hot fix) For too many tabs saving error, synchronous saving is disabled.
